p: The correlations among the protozoa and the main bacterial phyla and Euryarchaeota are reported in Appendix Table. The most significant correlations showed that Euryarchaeota was positively correlated with Ophryscolecinae ( r = 0.697; P < 0.05), but negatively correlated with Entodinium ( r = −0.584; P < 0.05). In contrast, Proteobacteria was positively correlated with Entodinium ( r = 0.658; P < 0.05). The regressions among the main bacterial phyla and the CH 4 emissions (% in total GP) are shown in Fig. 1. Firmicutes and Bacteroidetes were positively related to CH 4 emission, whereas Proteobacteria and Spirochaetes were negatively correlated.
